statement.text: (select p.group_id,m.* from {schema}sys_group_permissions p, {schema}sys_modules m where m.module_id = p.module_id)

(select sys_menus.*, sys_modules.description, sys_modules.rf_active, sys_modules.dk_active, sys_modules.module_type, sys_modules.hint, sys_modules.mnemonic, sys_modules.icon_filename from {schema}sys_menus, {schema}sys_modules where sys_modules.module_id = sys_menus.module_id)

(select sys_toolbar.*, sys_modules.description, sys_modules.rf_active, sys_modules.dk_active, sys_modules.module_type, sys_modules.hint, sys_modules.mnemonic, sys_modules.icon_filename from {schema}sys_toolbar, {schema}sys_modules where sys_modules.module_id = sys_toolbar.module_id)
(select sugm.user_id,sgp.module_id from {schema}sys_user_group_membership sugm, {schema}sys_group_permissions sgp where sgp.group_id = sugm.group_id)

(select p.*,b.expiry_date,m.description from {schema}app_pallet p, {schema}app_material_batch b, {schema}app_material m where b.material = p.material and b.batch_number = p.batch_number and m.material = p.material)

(select p.*,b.expiry_date,m.description from {schema}app_pallet_history p, {schema}app_material_batch b, {schema}app_material m where b.material = p.material and b.batch_number = p.batch_number and m.material = p.material)
